languages.text: Данные расходятся в деталях, однако сходятся в одном: на Кьяве Гамма, богатом рудой и минералами мире, который принадлежит династии Вольного Торговца, произошла некая катастрофа.
Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.
languages.original_text: Данные расходятся в деталях, однако сходятся в одном: на Кьяве Гамма, богатом рудой и минералами мире, который принадлежит династии Вольного Торговца, произошла некая катастрофа.

traits.locale_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.
Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.
Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.
Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

languages.text: 虽然人们对这场灾难的细节说法不一，但有一件事情是一致的——行商浪人王朝麾下的基亚瓦伽马星，一个富含矿物的世界，爆发了某种灾难。
languages.original_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

traits.locale_text: 虽然人们对这场灾难的细节说法不一，但有一件事情是一致的——行商浪人王朝麾下的基亚瓦伽马星，一个富含矿物的世界，爆发了某种灾难。

languages.text: 詳細については諸説異なるが、一つの点において一致している。それは、自由開拓者の王朝が所有する、鉱石や鉱物が豊富な惑星キアヴァ・ガンマで、何らかの大惨事が発生したということだ。
languages.original_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

traits.locale_text: 詳細については諸説異なるが、一つの点において一致している。それは、自由開拓者の王朝が所有する、鉱石や鉱物が豊富な惑星キアヴァ・ガンマで、何らかの大惨事が発生したということだ。

languages.text: Los detalles cambian de un relato a otro, pero coinciden en que Kiava Gamma, un mundo propiedad de la dinastía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente rico en minerales y metales de todo tipo, ha sufrido un cataclismo de alguna clase.
languages.original_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

traits.locale_text: Los detalles cambian de un relato a otro, pero coinciden en que Kiava Gamma, un mundo propiedad de la dinastía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente rico en minerales y metales de todo tipo, ha sufrido un cataclismo de alguna clase.

languages.text: Die Berichte weichen in einigen Details voneinander ab, sind sich aber in einem Punkt einig: auf Kiava Gamma, einer Welt im Besitz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die reich an Erzen und Mineralien ist, war Opfer einer wie auch immer gearteten Katastrophe.
languages.original_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

traits.locale_text: Die Berichte weichen in einigen Details voneinander ab, sind sich aber in einem Punkt einig: auf Kiava Gamma, einer Welt im Besitz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die reich an Erzen und Mineralien ist, war Opfer einer wie auch immer gearteten Katastrophe.

languages.text: Les détails varient selon les témoignages, mais une chose est sûre : une catastrophe s'est produite sur Kiava Gamma, un monde riche en minerai appartenant à la dynastie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

traits.locale_text: Les détails varient selon les témoignages, mais une chose est sûre : une catastrophe s'est produite sur Kiava Gamma, un monde riche en minerai appartenant à la dynastie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Gelen bilgilerde bazı detaylar farklılık gösterse de hepsi tek bir konuda aynı şeyi söylüyor: Hür Tacir'in hanedanlığının sahibi olduğu, cevher ve mineral bakımından zengin bir dünya olan Kiava Gama'da bir çeşit felaket meydana gelmiş.
languages.original_text: Accounts vary in the details, but they do agree on one thing: on Kiava Gamma, a world owned by the Rogue Trader's dynasty and rich in ore and minerals, some kind of catastrophe has occurred.

traits.locale_text: Gelen bilgilerde bazı detaylar farklılık gösterse de hepsi tek bir konuda aynı şeyi söylüyor: Hür Tacir'in hanedanlığının sahibi olduğu, cevher ve mineral bakımından zengin bir dünya olan Kiava Gama'da bir çeşit felaket meydana gelmiş.
